Origene Fisher Scientific). Protein searches were performed against SwissProt database by 182 using Proteome Discoverer Version 1.3 (Thermo Fisher Scientific). The following 183 criteria were used to select protein candidates for further analysis: background 184 deduction (samples with kenpaullone treatment were set as background), rank = 1, at 185 least two unique peptides, with a high confidence (1% false discovery rate) and score. 186

The RNA ChIP technique is applied to detect the association of individual proteins 189 with specific JHMV RNA sequences in vivo as described previously with some 190 modifications (Niranjanakumari et al., 2002) . In brief, 1x10 7 infected cells (MOI = 1, 191 6 h p.i.) were fixed with 1% formaldehyde for 10 min and the reaction was quenched 192 by the addition of glycine to a final concentration of 125 mM followed by incubation 193 for 5 min. The crosslinked cell resuspended in 1mL RIPA buffer containing protease 194 inhibitors, phosphatase inhibitor, and RNaseOUT 50 U/ml (Invitrogen) were sheared 195 by sonication to solubilize RNPs. Antibodies (5 μg/mL) were added to each IP tube 196 containing 100 μl lysates at room temperature for 3 h and incubated for 1 h after 197 adding protein G-sepharose beads (GE Healthcare). Antibodies are as follows: N, 198 DDX1, and control IgG.
